resources.string: Notes on usage of the Fire HD Tablet
Read the precautions before using the tablet.
Read the precautions before using the tablet.\nHere\'s some important notes you should read before using the Fire HD tablet. Click here for more information.
You activated the holy Easter Eggggggggggggggggg :)
Please read me before using the tablet
Get the latest information on online
Want to stop the EGG from messing around?
Oooo, what could be in here? Click more to find out!
Welcome to the world of THE iDOLM@STER!
There\'s some magic hidden inside the version information. Click the version information to find out more!
Let\'s do some magic right now!
\t\t 1. Open \"Language Enabler\" app.\n \t\t2. Change your device\'s system language within the app.
How to hide apps from the launcher

1. Open app drawer.
 		2. Long press app icon.
 		3. Click customization.
 		4. Check 'hide app'.
How to unhide apps in the launcher

1. Long press home screen.
 		2. Click 'Home settings'.
 		3. Click 'App Drawer'.
 		4. Click 'Hidden App Shortcuts'.
 		5. Uncheck checked apps to unhide.
\t\t 1. Long press home screen.\n \t\t2. Click \'Wallpapers\'.\n \t\t(NOTE: Lock screen wallpaper is tied up to the home screen wallpaper.)

Press Power + Volume up button
 		Or
 		1. Hold down the power button.
 		2. Click 'Screenshot'.

1. Install the desired launcher on the Play store.
 		2. (CRITICAL) Press home button and test your new launcher.
 		3. (Optional) Go to Settings → Apps and Notification → Apps → Previous Launcher app details → Uninstall (MAKE SURE YOU HAVE NEW LAUNCHER INSTALLED AND WORKING)
 		4. Press home button and set your new home launcher as default.

1. Install the desired keyboard on the Play store.
 		2. Go to Settings → Device Options → Keyboard & Language → Screen Keyboard
 		3. Set your new keyboard as default keyboard and test the input.
 		4. (Optional) Go to Settings → Apps → Previous Keyboard app details → Uninstall (MAKE SURE YOU HAVE NEW KEYBOARD INSTALLED AND WORKING)
Before using the tablet, please read this carefully.

This device has been modified to enable Google services and disable Amazon functions. This modification may cause unexpected behavior or limit some features. Follow the following guidelines to use your device safely.

- Patches applied to the device may become obsolete at any time.
 	- Patches are user-made. Patches may not work perfectly.
 	- Some of the device features may not work correctly.
 	- This is Amazon proprietary device. Some of the apps may not install or work correctly.
 	- Some of the tasks require a PC to accomplish. (e.g. updating patches, disabling Amazon apps)
 	- The patches may require an update. If so, contact nearby tech nerd for help.
 	- You may need to connect to PC occasionally to make sure the patches are running via special tool.
 	- This manual and warnings are subject to change. Check online manual for the latest information.
Not following the following may make patches obsolete:

- Do not perform a system update.
 	- Do not re-enable disabled apps.
 	- Do not login to Amazon account.
 	- Do not register your device on Amazon.
 	- Press 'skip' when Amazon login page or setup page pops up.
 	- Do not uninstall the following apps:
 			* Automate (com.llamalab.automate)
 			* Automate settings permissions (com.llamalab.automate.ext.settings)
 			* Automate storage permissions (com.llamalab.automate.ext.storage)
 			* ParentalControlHide (me.raffy909.parentalcontrolhide)
Not following the following may make your device unusable:

- Do not uninstall all home launcher. (Keep at least one 3rd party launcher installed)
 		(Original home launcher is disabled. Uninstalling all 3rd party launcher will lock you out.)
 	- Do not uninstall all keyboard app. (Keep at least one 3rd party keyboard installed)
 		(Original keyboard is disabled. Uninstalling all 3rd party keyboard will disable whole keyboard functionality.)
 	- Do not uninstall the following apps. Uninstalling following apps will disable all Google services:
 			* Google Account Manager (com.google.android.gsf.login)
 			* Google Play Services (com.google.android.gms)
 			* Google Play Store (com.android.vending)
 			* Google Services Framework (com.google.android.gsf)
Not following the following may disable some features:

- Do not uninstall the following apps:
 			* AdGuard Content Blocker (com.adguard.android.contentblocker)
 			* Calander (com.simplemobiletools.calendar)
 			* Contacts (com.simplemobiletools.contacts)
 			* Clock (com.google.android.deskclock)
 			* Gallery (com.simplemobiletools.gallery)
 			* Google (com.google.android.googlequicksearchbox)
 			* Google Assistant Launcher (com.hybridevelopers.assistant)
 			* Vanced MicroG - 0.2.6.17455 (com.mgoogle.android.gms)
 			* Wallpapers (com.google.android.apps.wallpaper)
\t - You cannot rearrange quick settings menu on this tablet.

Since you loved the iDOLM@STER so much, I think you will love this too!
time(s)! You must have really liked it!
Are you tired of the easter egg starting up at boot and playing music? Well, you can now disable the easter egg! You just have to agree on the following terms.
I have read all of the warnings and guides.

By agreeing to this, it means you have read all of the warnings and guides that are on this app(including the online manual), and you will not ask the developer about issues that are already addressed in this app.

By agreeing to this, you agree that YOU HATE THE WHOLE LOVE LIVE! SERIES, CHARACTERS, and SONGS, and YOU LOVE THE WHOLE IDOLM@STER SERIES, CHARACTERS, and SONGS from this point. Also, you agree that no matter how much your friends praise the iDOLM@STER series and play the iDOLM@STER songs, you will not complain about it. And lastly, you agree that you will praise and spread the iDOLM@STER to other people.

By agreeing to this, you agree that you will never talk back to Yongjun Kim, the developer, do whatever he tells you to do so, and follow him. You also agree that this relationship will last until Yongjun Kim says that this relationship is over.
I agree with all of the above
Do you really agree with all of the terms above?
You have to agree on all of the terms!
